translations: 杜鹃花，杜鹃花属（rhododendron 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Several of these rhododendrons will flower this year for the first time.
sentences.translation: 这些杜鹃花中有好几株今年将第一次开花。

sentences.sentence: In Greece, rhododendrons and oleander bloom only in springtime, when they are the predominant sources of nectar.
sentences.translation: 在希腊，杜鹃花和夹竹桃只在春天开花，那时它们是花蜜的主要来源。

sentences.sentence: All right! You produce your rhododendrons gum!
sentences.translation: 好吧！你就制作你的杜鹃口香糖！
